hero.title: EzStart
hero.description: EZ Start is a Boilerplate that provides a comprehensive and flexible starting point for your web development projects. Built with modern technologies and best practices, it helps you kickstart your development process with a robust foundation.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Built your next powerfull app with
features.description: These features are already available and integrated for all users of this boilerplate. If only certain features interest you, you can find them in the application documentation. The documentation is currently being written; if you need more information, don't hesitate to contact me.

content.title: Cutting-Edge Stack
content.description: Leverage the power of Next.js 14 to build your applications. Ez-start employs TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Prisma ORM, and more to provide a modern and efficient development environment. Stay ahead with the latest web technologies, best practices, and optimized SEO.

content.title: Secure Authentication
content.description: Implement secure authentication in your application using Auth.js, the latest version of Next-Auth.js. This allows for integration with various providers such as Google and GitHub, ensuring flexible and secure user authentication and account management.

content.title: Global Reach with i18n
content.description: Expand your application's reach globally with Next-Intl for seamless localization. This setup enables you to manage translations effortlessly and cater to a diverse audience by breaking language barriers.

content.title: Efficient Database Management
content.description: Integrate Prisma for simplified and efficient database management. Generate automatic migrations, access type-safe data, and ensure compatibility with PostgreSQL, SQLite, and MySQL.

content.title: Rich Component Library
content.description: Galvanized by the components of shadcn/ui to create dynamic and accessible user interfaces. This boilerplate includes custom components designed to fully integrate translation with Next-Intl for effortless internationalization.

content.title: Payment with Stripe
content.description: Integration of secure payment with Stripe for smooth and reliable transaction management. This upcoming implementation will allow users to make secure payments, with full support for major credit cards and popular payment methods.

get-started.title: Get Started
content: To get started with EzStart Boilerplate, click the 'Get Started' button above and follow the setup instructions. Customize the configuration files to suit your project needs and start building your application with ease.
This boilerplate is designed to be flexible and extensible, allowing you to add features and modify existing ones to meet your specific requirements.
